p: The coding sequence of CHKVmab variable region of HC (V H) and LC (V L) (Pal et al., 2013) was fused to the corresponding DNA sequences of human IgG1 constant regions of HC (C H) and LC (C L), respectively. The resulting HC and LC coding sequences were cloned into MagnICON‐based plant expression vectors pICH21595 and pICH11599, and transformed into A. tumefaciens as described previously (He et al., 2012; Lai et al., 2010).
